<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sounds </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Makes sure that a sound can start playing without any delay once it is needed. Command works in Arma 3, but might not be implemented in earlier Arma installments. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''preloadSound''' soundName </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> soundName: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>{
	[[waitUntil]] {[[preloadSound]] _x};
} [[forEach]] [[getArray]] ([[missionConfigFile]] >> "CfgSounds" >> "sounds");</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[preloadTitleRsc]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
